se.jguru.nazgul.core.resource.impl.resourcebundle

Class ResourceBundleLocalResources

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.jguru.nazgul.core.resource.impl.resourcebundle.ResourceBundleLocalResources
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LocalResources

    public class ResourceBundleLocalResources
extends Object
implements LocalResources
    ResourceBundle-delegating implementation of the LocalResources specification using a backing ResourceBundle to realize the protocol.
    Author:
    Lennart Jörelid, jGuru Europe AB

    • Constructor Detail

      • ResourceBundleLocalResources

        public ResourceBundleLocalResources(ResourceBundle resourceBundle,
                                    String resourceBundleBaseName,
                                    Locale defaultLocale)
        Creates a new ResourceBundleLocalResources delegating typed calls to the provided ResourceBundle.
        Parameters:
        resourceBundle - A non-null ResourceBundle.
        resourceBundleBaseName - The non-null baseName of the provided ResourceBundle.
        defaultLocale - The default/fallback locale for all lookups.

      • ResourceBundleLocalResources

        public ResourceBundleLocalResources(String resourceBundleBaseName,
                                    Locale defaultLocale)
        Creates a new ResourceBundleLocalResources delegating typed calls to the provided ResourceBundle.
        Parameters:
        resourceBundleBaseName - The non-null baseName to generate a ResourceBundle using ResourceBundle.getBundle(resourceBundleBaseName, defaultLocale)
        defaultLocale - The default/fallback locale for all lookups. Also used to create the internal ResourceBundle using the call ResourceBundle.getBundle(resourceBundleBaseName, defaultLocale).

      • ResourceBundleLocalResources

        public ResourceBundleLocalResources(String resourceBundleBaseName)
        Creates a new ResourceBundleLocalResources delegating typed calls to the provided ResourceBundle.
        Parameters:
        resourceBundleBaseName - The non-null baseName to generate a ResourceBundle using ResourceBundle.getBundle(resourceBundleBaseName, Locale.getDefault())

    • Method Detail

      • getLocalized

        public final String getLocalized(String key,
                                 String defaultValue)
        Retrieves a localized String from the underlying local resources, using the currently active Locale.
        Specified by:
        getLocalized in interface LocalResources
        Parameters:
        key - The key within the underlying ResourceBundle structure for the value to acquire.
        defaultValue - The fallback/default value to return if no value was present within the underlying ResourceBundle structure.
        Returns:
        The localized T instance acquired from the underlying ResourceBundle structure at key key, or the defaultValue should no value exist for the given key within the underlying ResourceBundle structure.

      • getLocalized

        public final String getLocalized(String key,
                                 String defaultValue,
                                 Locale locale)
        Retrieves a localized T instance from the underlying local resources.
        Specified by:
        getLocalized in interface LocalResources
        Parameters:
        key - The key within the underlying ResourceBundle structure for the value to acquire.
        defaultValue - The fallback/default value to return if no value was present within the underlying ResourceBundle structure.
        locale - The locale for which the resource should be retrieved.
        Returns:
        The localized T instance acquired from the underlying ResourceBundle structure at key key, or the defaultValue should no value exist for the given key within the underlying ResourceBundle structure.

      • getLocalized

        public final String getLocalized(String key,
                                 String defaultValue,
                                 String... keyValueTokens)
        Retrieves a localized T instance from the underlying local resources, using the currently active Locale.
        Specified by:
        getLocalized in interface LocalResources
        Parameters:
        key - The key within the underlying ResourceBundle structure for the value to acquire.
        defaultValue - The fallback/default value to return if no value was present within the underlying ResourceBundle structure.
        keyValueTokens - Either null, or a list holding strings on the form key=value where both key and value must be non-empty. The keyValueTokens will be substituted before the result is returned.
        Returns:
        The localized T instance acquired from the underlying ResourceBundle structure at key key, or the defaultValue should no value exist for the given key within the underlying ResourceBundle structure.

      • getLocalized

        public String getLocalized(String key,
                           String defaultValue,
                           Locale locale,
                           String... keyValueTokens)
        Retrieves a localized T instance from the underlying local resources, and using the provided arguments as token placeholders.
        Specified by:
        getLocalized in interface LocalResources
        Parameters:
        key - The key within the underlying ResourceBundle structure for the value to acquire.
        defaultValue - The fallback/default value to return if no value was present within the underlying ResourceBundle structure.
        locale - The locale for which the resource should be retrieved.
        keyValueTokens - Either null, or a list holding strings on the form key=value where both key and value must be non-empty.
        Returns:
        The localized T instance acquired from the underlying ResourceBundle structure at key key, or the defaultValue should no value exist for the given key within the underlying ResourceBundle structure.

      • setDefaultLocale

        public final boolean setDefaultLocale(Locale defaultLocale)
        (Re-)assigns the locale used should no Locale be submitted with the lookup call. The defaultLocale is kept as long as the LocalResources instance lives.
        Specified by:
        setDefaultLocale in interface LocalResources
        Parameters:
        defaultLocale - The new default locale, used if no Locale is submitted with calls.
        Returns:
        true if the defaultLocale was successfully set, and false otherwise.
